name: Zero'd
description:
Made for Trijam 144 in less than 3 hours, Zeroed is a quick platformer with a novel mechanic, where a central line serves as a way to replenish health, and any time away from it reduces one's health.

I liked making this one, and it's the first time I've ever made a game in a day. The mechanic is, in my opinion, a great idea, one which can create some very tense situations, but I must admit that the end result is not really the greatest at achieving that. Still, it's a pretty fun way to spend five minutes.
